channel.title: Reservoir Modelling on Ney
channel.description: Recent content in Reservoir Modelling on Ney

item.title: Assessment of Flow Indices and Field Sectoring for Strategic Oil Well Placement and Production
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: This work investigates optimal well placement in a 3D heterogeneous reservoir by comparing different location strategies based on flow zone indicators (FZI and FZI*).
